text:
This is the output on running startup:-

Using CATALINA_BASE:   D:\jakarta-tomcat-5.0.9
Using CATALINA_HOME:   D:\jakarta-tomcat-5.0.9
Using CATALINA_TMPDIR: D:\jakarta-tomcat-5.0.9\temp
Using JAVA_HOME:       D:\jdk1.2.2
Bootstrap: Class loader creation threw exception
java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException: current thread not owner
	at org.apache.catalina.loader.StandardClassLoader.addRepositoryInternal
(StandardClassLoader.java, Compiled Code)
	at org.apache.catalina.loader.StandardClassLoader.<init>
(StandardClassLoader.java, Compiled Code)

(ClassLoaderFactory.java, Compiled Code)

(Bootstrap.java, Compiled Code)
	at org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap.initClassLoaders
(Bootstrap.java:135)
	at org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap.init(Bootstrap.java:206)
	at org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap.main(Bootstrap.java:375)
